code: import React from"react";import"./Card.css";import AddPortfolio from"../Portfolio/AddPortfolio/AddPortfolio";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Card=_ref=>{let{id,searchResult,onPortfolioCreate}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center justify-between w-full p-6 bg-slate-100 rounded-lg md:flex-row",id:id,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/company/".concat(searchResult.symbol),className:"font-bold text-center text-black md:text-left",children:[searchResult.name," (",searchResult.symbol,")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-black",children:searchResult.currency}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"font-bold text-black",children:[searchResult.exchangeShortName," - ",searchResult.stockExchange]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddPortfolio,{onPortfolioCreate:onPortfolioCreate,symbol:searchResult.symbol})]},id);};export default Card;
